mapper.select: SELECT a.*,c.NM_T as C_NM_T,c.PH_P as C_PH_P FROM accnt a left join cont c on a.CONT_ID=c.ID WHERE a.ID=#{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO accnt
ROW_ID, C_DT, UP_DT, C_ID, NM_T, XZ_LV, WZ_T, HY_LV, TY_LV, LV_LV, ST_LV, CM_TX, WORK_P, EMAIL, STATE, CITY, COUNTY, STREET, POSTAL, BU_ID, CONT_ID,
#{row_id}, #{c_dt}, #{up_dt}, #{c_id}, #{nm_t}, #{xz_lv}, #{wz_t}, #{hy_lv}, #{ty_lv}, #{lv_lv}, #{st_lv}, #{cm_tx}, #{work_p}, #{email}, #{state}, #{city}, #{county}, #{street}, #{postal}, #{bu_id}, #{cont_id},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
